title: What font are these?
content:
The paragraph seems to be Chronicle Display (I could be wrong) but I'm not sure what the font is where it says "Caliente" in the bottom.  
Thanks.

Font: 

 Austin (Hairline) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061659/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [YkelZ.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061659/http:/typophile.com/files/YkelZ.jpg) | 673.84 KB |
author: cogml

comments.content: That's (all) [Austin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061659/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/austin) (Hairline Roman) by Commercial Type Berton Hasebe, Paul Barnes and Ilya Ruderman.
